#summary Guides to create a new theme.

===How to create a new theme?===
All the themes that come with the release are placed under [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/prettify/theme/package-summary.html prettify.theme] package. All themes should extends the [http://java-prettify.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/javadoc/prettify/Theme.html prettify.Theme] class. You can take a look at [http://code.google.com/p/java-prettify/source/browse/trunk/src/prettify/theme/ThemeDefault.java syntaxhighlighter.theme.ThemeDefault] to see what should be done to make a new theme.
